reviews.review_text:
Starting off, the place is extremely pet-friendly. The owners were very welcoming to our dog, and went out of their way to make him comfortable, be it the table we sat at, water, or even goodies for him.

The food, is definitely better than what we usually refer to as Italian. The bread was prepared well, the ingredients were fresh, and tastes were well balanced.

The prices however are crazy. A dish of 4 tiny bruschettas for 440 felt quite overpriced. The table cloths and surroundings could use a bit of improvement and clean up. A bit of help in ordering would be nice (it is assumed that diners already are well versed with ‘actual’ Italian verbiage).

They don’t serve alcohol, but are kind enough to let you get your own, if u want.

Authentic Italian pizzas cooked to perfection and made with lots of love. Charming cozy little restaurant easily hidden from the main road offers one of the best Italian food in goa. Run by the charming Mr Davide and his partner who makes his guests comfortable and single handedly manages the guests and serves everyone with a big smile.

Loved everything we ordered especially the salmon pizza and the coffee cheesecake with salted caramel dressing. The pizza crust is just perfectly made and the toppings are great and made of good quality ingredients.

Recommend this place for anyone looking for authentic Italian food only.

This probably has the best Italian food in town with an amazing host and a great ambience… Without a doubt! I will highly recommend to anyone looking for an authentic experience for some Italian food! We finished everything on our plates all 6 of us (3 kids and 3 adults)
